attributes.action: Donald Trump is welcome to a state visit  of Great Britain.
attributes.additional_details:
President Donald Trump has signed an executive order that banned travel into the United States for citizens from these seven countries for 90 days: Iran, Iraq, Libya, Somalia, Sudan, Syria and Yemen.

We agree that some safety precautions  should be put into place in Great Britain. Sign this petition for Donald Trumps entry to England.
attributes.background:
We the people want a temporary ban in immigration from seven countries and extreme vetting of entrants to our country from the seven following nations. 

Iraq
Syria 
Libya
Sudan
Somalia 
Iran 
Yemen. 

Following Donald Trumps concerns.
